page.title: 05Leisure in S.Clevedon & Kenn
page.content: In my{Leisure}time I go to{Guides}on Friday nights 7.30-9.00 We have outings and parties.We play games,work for badges and have patrol times.We go camping and do sponsored discos and silences.{Scouts}meet on Fridays 7-9 The{Methodist Church youth club}is for all the children over 7years who go to {Sunday school.}They meet on Wednesday 6.30 7.45. The{Sailing Club}meets at Beach Road on Friday night 7-9. Anybody aged 9-18 can go. You need a Life Jacket and preferably a wet suit. They sail in the sea using Sailing club boats. My brother used to play for Clevedon United football Club at Colleridge Vale at 6.00 on Thursday. There is a Wednesday{Club {which does carpentry}for 9-17 year olds.
